alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 13 at 3:19AM MDT until July 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 100 and 105 expected. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley and Upper Tularosa Valley. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; Upper Tularosa Valley
